AddressInfo.Title: The Hilton Hotel Umhlanga
AddressInfo.AddressLine1: 1 Ncondo Place, Westridge, eThekwini Ward 35, Umhlanga Rocks
AddressInfo.AccessComments: When on Ncondo Place Road with the Arch on your left, enter the Hilton Garden Inn hotel parking just past the ACC entrance - Continue down through the boom gate and turn left. The charger is located on the right hand side.

GeneralComments:
Open Hours Restricted
No Reservations Allowed
Charging is billed
